amendment.description: Amendment reduces funds for the Operation and Maintenance Account, Defense-Wide by $24 million and increases funds for the Fisher House Foundation by $16 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for Operation and Maintenance, Defense-Wide by $24,000,000 and increase funds for a grant to the Fisher House Foundation , Inc. by $16,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Delaney amendment (A015) Agreed to by voice vote.
